set.name: DMBD-16 20th Chronicle Deck: Battle Now!! Bolshack Duel

card.name: Bolshack Yamato Dragon / Yamato Decapitation Sword

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ While attacking, this creature gets +1000 power for each fire card in your graveyard. ■ When you would destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 6000 or less by the effect of Bolmeteus Musha Dragon, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 12000 or less instead. TWINPACT {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 4000 or less. If you have a Dragon in the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 12000 or less instead.

property.name: Rules1
Rules2
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 4000 or less. If you have a Dragon in the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 12000 or less instead.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-16 20th Chronicle Deck: Battle Now!! Bolshack Duel

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {POWERED BREAKER} (This creature breaks an additional shield for each 6000 power.) ■ When you put this creature, choose one of your opponent's creatures and put it into its owner's mana zone. Then you may put a Dragon creature that has Bolshack in its name from your mana zone that costs the same as or less than the number of cards in your mana zone. ■ This creature gets +1000 power for each fire card in your graveyard.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-16 20th Chronicle Deck: Battle Now!! Bolshack Duel

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Double Sympathy: Dragon (This creature costs 2 less to summon for each of your dragon creatures. It can't cost 0 or less.) {WORLD BREAKER} ■ Each of your Dragons gets "speed attacker". ■ Whenever one of your Dragons attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Dragon, you may put it.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-16 20th Chronicle Deck: Battle Now!! Bolshack Duel

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Revolution 0 Trigger: Whenever a creature attacks you, if you have no shields, you may reveal this creature from your hand. If you do, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a non-evolution fire creature, put this creature on top of it. ■ Evolution: Put on one of your fire creatures. {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature or whenever it attacks, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. This creature and that creature battle.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-16 20th Chronicle Deck: Battle Now!! Bolshack Duel

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {POWER ATTACKER} +5000 (While attacking, this creature gets +2000 power.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Players can't summon creatures that cost 4 or less. TWINPACT ■ Look at the top 6 cards of your deck. From among them, you may put any number of Dragons that have Bolshack in their name into the battle zone. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules

Then shuffle your deck. ■ This creature gets "power attacker +1000" for each Fire Bird creature in your graveyard. TWINPACT {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Tap all your opponent's creatures.

From among them, add all cards that have "Bolshack" in their name into your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. {CHARGER} (After you cast this spell, put it into your mana zone instead of your graveyard.)
